node.display_long_description:
Premium Bowling是一款真實的而又易於上手的保齡球遊戲，支援線上和線下諸多好玩的模式。

在家中就能享受到最佳的保齡球體驗。參與激烈的線上多人比賽和讓人熱血沸騰的線上聯賽，在每日和每週的排行榜上爭得一席之地，並且有機會躋身世界頂尖玩家的行列。

遊戲特點：
 - 在保齡球遊戲中本遊戲的物理擬真度首屈一指
 - 風格迥異球館和音樂
 - 各種各樣具有完全不同物理屬性的保齡球
 - 支持創建和編輯自己想要的球
 - 每週和每日都有單局和系列的最高分排行榜
 - 玩家排名每週更新
 - 聯賽有周賽和月賽
 - 油型多種多樣，有難有易
 - 球道上的油會被球吸收並且被球帶入無油區，從而使球道上油的狀態和現實一樣每時每刻都有變化，是對保齡球水準的終極考驗
 - 每天的球道都有細微變化，和現實一樣
 - 極高的物理定制自由度，支援玩家創造自己想要的物理沙盒
 - 支持單人，線下多人和線上多人

 - Prevent accidental menu button presses and thumbstick walking when throwing.
 - Bug fixes and small improvements.

1.18.11:  
 - Performance improvements to online multiplayer game when new players are joining in.
 - Bug fixes and small improvements.

1.18.10: 
 - Adds a private chat for multiplayer competition, improves commentator and fixes several bugs.

node.internet_connection_name: 下载内容需要连接网络

node.reviewDescription:
While Premium Bowling scratches the itch for a bowling game on the Quest (why did it take so long?), it does in a rather workmanlike manner.

There's a nice variety of alley environments to choose from which is wonderful, although the level of detail in each environment varies considerably. The "Party Bowling" lane which is most like your typical bowling alley, is strangely the most bland and basic. Could be improved considerably by adding a higher level of detail.

The good:

1) Lots of environments
2) Perfectly paced games
3) Feels like bowling
4) Many options for online and offline solo and multiplayer

The bad:
1) FUGLY characters, randomly generated. I'm fine with diversity, but these character designs are creepy and unattractive by any measure. And the character selector is randomly generated - you'll give up and pick a rando long before finding anyone resembling yourself. Also seems to be zero Caucasian males available.
2) Not only is setting up multiplayer matches unintuitive and challenging, both players see different NPCs in the alley around them. Also, when watching your live opponent bowl, you'll see a strike when they rolled something different. Makes it really difficult to comment on their performance when you're not able to accurately see what they bowled.
3) Only displays one player's score at a time. C'mon, make it look like the scoring display at an actual alley.
4) Picking up the ball is overly finicky. Should be more automatic rather than a targeting exercise each an every time.
5) Character models contort like something out of a horror film while bowling. 
6) Speaking of character models again, they all look clinically depressed and slouch around the alley with dead-eye stares. No animated bowling alley chatter to warm the background, and only the most occasional half-hearted applause
7) Needs the ability to play custom soundtrack from user owned MP3s. The music included is fairly terrible.
8) More variety from commentator is needed.
node.reviewTitle: Not bad, lots of room for improvement
